documentation.text: @dev triggers minting of tokens to the given user, called by the child chain manager
@dev triggers burning of tokens on the child chain and unlocking on L1
@dev governance can change the child chain manager
@dev emitted when the child chain manager changes

@dev Matic Bridged Native SuperToken full interface
 @author Superfluid

devdoc.details: Functionality specific for Matic Bridged Native Super Tokens

ChildChainManagerChanged(address).details: emitted when the child chain manager changes

deposit(address,bytes).details: triggers minting of tokens to the given user, called by the child chain manager

updateChildChainManager(address).details: governance can change the child chain manager

withdraw(uint256).details: triggers burning of tokens on the child chain and unlocking on L1
